title: Self-charging aqueous hydrogen gas batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE03913G, Paper
Zhengxin Zhu, Zehui Xie, Weiping Wang, Zaichun Liu, Mingming Wang, Yahan Meng, Qia Peng, Shuang Liu, Taoli Jiang, Kai Zhang, Hongxu Liu, Yirui Ma, Wei Chen
Self-charging aqueous hydrogen gas batteries with three different self-charging modes are developed, i.e., chemically self-charging, short-circuit induced self-charging, and low-energy-input triggered quasi-self-charging.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
